languages.text: {n}Сенешаль перехватывает оружие поудобнее и громыхает:{/n} "Лишь один человек может восседать на троне Вольного Торговца, и имя {mf|ему|ей} — {name} фон Валанциус. Жалким подделкам, крамольным ксеносам и врагам Человечества место у его подножья, в луже крови, под пятой владыки династии!"

{n}The Seneschal adjusts his grip on his weapon and growls,{/n} "Only one {mf|man|woman} may sit on the throne of the Rogue Trader, and that is {name} von Valancius. Wretched pretenders, craven xenos, enemies of Humanity — their only rightful place is in a pool of blood at the {mf|lord|lady} of the dynasty's feet!"
languages.original_text: {n}Сенешаль перехватывает оружие поудобнее и громыхает:{/n} "Лишь один человек может восседать на троне Вольного Торговца, и имя {mf|ему|ей} — {name} фон Валанциус. Жалким подделкам, крамольным ксеносам и врагам Человечества место у его подножья, в луже крови, под пятой владыки династии!"

traits.locale_text: {n}The Seneschal adjusts his grip on the weapon and rumbles:{/n} "Only one {mf|man|woman} can sit on the throne of the Rogue Trader, and this is {name} von Valancius. The wretched fakes, the craven xenos, and the enemies of Humanity belong at {mf|his|her} feet, in a pool of blood, under the heel of the {mf|lord|lady} of the dynasty!"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}The Seneschal adjusts his grip on the weapon and rumbles:{/n} "Only one {mf|man|woman} can sit on the throne of the Rogue Trader, and this is {name} von Valancius. Wretched pretenders, craven xenos, enemies of Humanity — their only rightful place is in a pool of blood at the {mf|lord|lady} of the dynasty's feet!"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}El Senescal ajusta la mano con la que sujeta su arma y gruñe:{/n} «Solo hay {mf|un hombre digno|una mujer digna} de sentarse en el trono de Comerciante Independiente, y es {name} von Valancius. Los farsantes indignos, los xenos cobardes y demás enemigos de la Humanidad... ¡su lugar es un charco de sangre a los pies de{mf|l señor| la señora} de la dinastía!».
languages.original_text: {n}The Seneschal adjusts his grip on his weapon and growls,{/n} "Only one {mf|man|woman} may sit on the throne of the Rogue Trader, and that is {name} von Valancius. Wretched pretenders, craven xenos, enemies of Humanity — their only rightful place is in a pool of blood at the {mf|lord|lady} of the dynasty's feet!"

traits.locale_text: {n}El Senescal ajusta la mano con la que sujeta su arma y gruñe:{/n} «Solo hay {mf|un hombre digno|una mujer digna} de sentarse en el trono de Comerciante Independiente, y es {name} von Valancius. Los farsantes indignos, los xenos cobardes y demás enemigos de la Humanidad... ¡su lugar es un charco de sangre a los pies de{mf|l señor| la señora} de la dinastía!».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}家令長は武器のグリップを調整し、不機嫌な声で言う。{/n}「自由開拓者の王座に座ることができる{mf|男性|女性}は、ただひとり…そしてそれは、{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウス様だけだ。惨めな成りすまし、卑しい異種族、人類の敵め…貴様らにお似合いの場所は、あの方の王朝の足元に広がる血の池の中だ！」
languages.original_text: {n}The Seneschal adjusts his grip on his weapon and growls,{/n} "Only one {mf|man|woman} may sit on the throne of the Rogue Trader, and that is {name} von Valancius. Wretched pretenders, craven xenos, enemies of Humanity — their only rightful place is in a pool of blood at the {mf|lord|lady} of the dynasty's feet!"

traits.locale_text: {n}家令長は武器のグリップを調整し、不機嫌な声で言う。{/n}「自由開拓者の王座に座ることができる{mf|男性|女性}は、ただひとり…そしてそれは、{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウス様だけだ。惨めな成りすまし、卑しい異種族、人類の敵め…貴様らにお似合いの場所は、あの方の王朝の足元に広がる血の池の中だ！」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}阿贝拉德调整着手里的武器，高声咆哮起来。{/n}“这世上只有一个人可以坐在行商浪人的宝座上，那便是{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯。至于那些该死的冒牌货、懦弱的异形、人类的宿敌，他们唯一该在的地方，就是行商浪人脚下的血泊之中！”
languages.original_text: {n}The Seneschal adjusts his grip on his weapon and growls,{/n} "Only one {mf|man|woman} may sit on the throne of the Rogue Trader, and that is {name} von Valancius. Wretched pretenders, craven xenos, enemies of Humanity — their only rightful place is in a pool of blood at the {mf|lord|lady} of the dynasty's feet!"

traits.locale_text: {n}阿贝拉德调整着手里的武器，高声咆哮起来。{/n}“这世上只有一个人可以坐在行商浪人的宝座上，那便是{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯。至于那些该死的冒牌货、懦弱的异形、人类的宿敌，他们唯一该在的地方，就是行商浪人脚下的血泊之中！”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Der Truchsess verlagert die Hände an seiner Waffe und knurrt:{/n} "Nur {mf|ein Mann|eine Frau} darf auf dem Thron {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} sitzen, und das ist {name} von Valancius. Elende Thronräuber, feige Xenos, Feinde der Menschheit — ihr einziger rechtmäßiger Platz ist in einer Pfütze Blut zu den Füßen {mf|des Lords|der Lady} der Dynastie!"
languages.original_text: {n}The Seneschal adjusts his grip on his weapon and growls,{/n} "Only one {mf|man|woman} may sit on the throne of the Rogue Trader, and that is {name} von Valancius. Wretched pretenders, craven xenos, enemies of Humanity — their only rightful place is in a pool of blood at the {mf|lord|lady} of the dynasty's feet!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Truchsess verlagert die Hände an seiner Waffe und knurrt:{/n} "Nur {mf|ein Mann|eine Frau} darf auf dem Thron {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} sitzen, und das ist {name} von Valancius. Elende Thronräuber, feige Xenos, Feinde der Menschheit — ihr einziger rechtmäßiger Platz ist in einer Pfütze Blut zu den Füßen {mf|des Lords|der Lady} der Dynastie!"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Le sénéchal ajuste sa prise sur son arme en grognant :{/n} « Une seule personne peut s'asseoir sur le trône {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}, et c'est {name} von Valancius. La place des imposteurs, xénos crapuleux et autres ennemis de l'humanité est aux pieds {mf|du seigneur|de la seigneure} de la dynastie, à agoniser dans une mare de sang ! »
languages.original_text: {n}The Seneschal adjusts his grip on his weapon and growls,{/n} "Only one {mf|man|woman} may sit on the throne of the Rogue Trader, and that is {name} von Valancius. Wretched pretenders, craven xenos, enemies of Humanity — their only rightful place is in a pool of blood at the {mf|lord|lady} of the dynasty's feet!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Le sénéchal ajuste sa prise sur son arme en grognant :{/n} « Une seule personne peut s'asseoir sur le trône {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}, et c'est {name} von Valancius. La place des imposteurs, xénos crapuleux et autres ennemis de l'humanité est aux pieds {mf|du seigneur|de la seigneure} de la dynastie, à agoniser dans une mare de sang ! »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Seneşal, silahını saldırıya uygun konuma getirip hırıldıyor.{/n} "Hür Tacir'in tahtında yalnızca tek bir kişi oturabilir ve o da {name} von Valancius'tur. Aşağılık sahtekârlar, ödlek zenolar, İnsanlığın düşmanları... Onların hak ettiği tek yer, hanedanlığının {mf|lordunun|leydisinin} ayaklarının dibindeki bir kan gölüdür!"
languages.original_text: {n}The Seneschal adjusts his grip on his weapon and growls,{/n} "Only one {mf|man|woman} may sit on the throne of the Rogue Trader, and that is {name} von Valancius. Wretched pretenders, craven xenos, enemies of Humanity — their only rightful place is in a pool of blood at the {mf|lord|lady} of the dynasty's feet!"
